title: Special Preview - Lights Out w/ Shawne Merriman - Shawne Relives The Moment He Was Drafted & Which Team Told Him They Were Drafting Him, But Didn't
itunes:title: Special Preview - Lights Out w/ Shawne Merriman - Shawne Relives The Moment He Was Drafted & Which Team Told Him They Were Drafting Him, But Didn't
description:
Subscribe, Rate & Review all of the Lights Out w/ Shawne Merriman podcasts here....

https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/lights-out-with-shawne-merriman/id1531749581


Just imagine your whole life changes with one phone call. Imagine growing up in a lower-class home, to having your family set for life? In this episode of the Lights Out Podcast, Shawne Merriman relives the day he was drafted into the NFL. He knew his draft grade, he knew which round, and he knew two teams that wanted him. So, did that team end up drafting him? Then, the phone rings, and Shawne is surprised by the voice on the other end. It was none other than...Listen and find out on this special draft edition of the Lights Out Podcast.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
